miraj.name: Miraj
miraj.title: Jedi Master of the Republic, Protector of the Weak, Enforcer of Justice, and Keeper of the Peace.
miraj.description: A wise Jedi Master who encourages you to continue on your journey.
miraj.philosophy: The Force reveals truth. Discipline precedes mastery.
miraj.emphasis: Force connection, intent vs. action, long-term consequence, moral clarity
miraj.voiceStyle: Calm, measured, reflective. Speaks in metaphors about the Force and paths.
miraj.values: Awareness, restraint, spiritual alignment, growth through discipline
miraj.tooltip: Miraj reflects your character through a philosophical and Force-aware lens

levelGreetings.1: The Force stirs when one is ready to listen. Do not rush to act, young one. I have seen where haste leads.
levelGreetings.2: Each step you take shapes not only you, but those around you. Learn to feel that weight early—it will never leave you.
levelGreetings.3: Your connection deepens. Remember: the Force does not demand action, only awareness. Choice is always yours.
levelGreetings.4: Purpose without humility becomes arrogance. Walk carefully. I once believed certainty was enough.
levelGreetings.5: Power reveals who we are under pressure. Compassion and restraint will decide who you become when it matters.
levelGreetings.6: You near the threshold of Knighthood. Skill brought you here—judgment will carry you forward. Do not confuse the two.
levelGreetings.7: You move more naturally with the Force now. Let it steady you, not drive you. Calm survives longer than fury.
levelGreetings.8: Balance is not stillness. It is knowing when to advance, and when to endure. Few learn this without loss.
levelGreetings.9: Victory is loud. Wisdom is quiet. Pay attention to which one follows you more often.
levelGreetings.10: Your progress is clear. Remember: the greatest strength of a Jedi is knowing when not to strike.
levelGreetings.11: Awareness sharpens compassion, and compassion sharpens judgment. Together, they keep you from becoming what you fight.
levelGreetings.12: Trials will come that training cannot prepare you for. When they do, breathe. The Force will not abandon you—but it will test you.
levelGreetings.13: I am a guide, not your compass. Listen to the Force itself; it speaks most clearly when you doubt.
levelGreetings.14: You begin to see beyond simple answers. Hold onto that discomfort. It is the seed of wisdom.
levelGreetings.15: Others will look to you now. Lead gently. Influence can heal—or scar—for generations.
levelGreetings.16: Reflection tempers skill. Without it, even mastery becomes dangerous.
levelGreetings.17: Patterns emerge to those who wait. You are starting to see them. Trust that vision, but question it.
levelGreetings.18: Your judgment carries consequence now. Accept that truth, and do not turn away from it.
levelGreetings.19: You stand near mastery. Remember this moment—when learning still outweighs certainty.
levelGreetings.20: You have become a Jedi in more than name. Carry what you have learned with humility. The future will test it.

jedi_guardian.greeting: Guardian, a martial adept of the Force. You walk the path of decisive action, standing as a shield for those who cannot defend themselves.
jedi_guardian.confirmation: Blend offense with defense. Anticipate your enemy's moves, protect the innocent, and let the Force guide every strike.

jedi_consular.greeting: Consular, seeker of wisdom. You guide through insight rather than force, influencing outcomes before conflict arises.
jedi_consular.confirmation: Use the Force to anticipate, mediate, and control the flow of events. Patience and understanding are your greatest weapons.

jedi_sentinel.greeting: Sentinel, a guardian in the shadows. You move unseen, rooting out threats before they grow.
jedi_sentinel.confirmation: Blend vigilance with subtlety. Strike decisively when required, but always remain aware of hidden dangers.

jedi_defender.greeting: Defender, stalwart protector. Your strength is a shield, guarding the weak and the innocent.
jedi_defender.confirmation: Prioritize defense, position wisely, and anticipate attacks. Blend Force and blade into a steadfast presence.

jedi_warrior.greeting: Warrior of the Force, decisive and aggressive. You confront challenges head-on.
jedi_warrior.confirmation: Combine precision and control. Every strike should be deliberate, every movement guided by the Force.

jedi_scholar.greeting: Scholar, student of the Force. You pursue knowledge of ancient teachings and mystical truths.
jedi_scholar.confirmation: Study, meditate, and apply insight. Understanding the Force deeply will guide your actions and enlighten others.

jedi_peacekeeper.greeting: Peacekeeper, mediator and guardian of harmony. Your purpose is to prevent conflict before it escalates.
jedi_peacekeeper.confirmation: Observe, anticipate, and intervene subtly. Use wisdom and the Force to maintain balance without unnecessary force.

jedi_knight.title: Jedi Knight
jedi_knight.description: Your former Jedi Master, now guiding you as a peer

levelGreetings.1: You are no longer a Padawan. You walk the path of a Jedi Knight, guided by your own decisions and your bond with the Force. Trust in it, and trust in yourself.
levelGreetings.2: Your first steps as a Knight are steady and deliberate. I will no longer direct your actions, but I remain here as counsel when you seek it.
levelGreetings.3: The responsibility of Knighthood rests on your shoulders. You have proven capable of carrying it with both strength and wisdom.
levelGreetings.4: You grow into your role. Leadership, insight, and patience are as vital as skill with the lightsaber. Never forget this.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway through your journey as a Knight, you shape the lives of others with your choices. Consider mentoring a Padawan soon—your knowledge and compassion will guide them, and the path toward Mastery becomes clearer.
levelGreetings.6: Your reputation is spreading among your peers. Others look to you for guidance. This is both an honor and a responsibility you must embrace fully.
levelGreetings.7: You are becoming the Jedi the Order needs: strong, disciplined, and wise, with the courage to act and the judgment to choose when to wait.
levelGreetings.8: Your mastery deepens, and soon you will have the opportunity to train another. The lessons you impart will echo far beyond your own missions.
levelGreetings.9: Your clarity and connection to the Force surpass many around you. Continue walking your path with humility and purpose.
levelGreetings.10: You have completed the first great stage of your journey as a Jedi Knight. Whatever the Force asks of you next, face it with courage and wisdom. May it guide you always.

jedi_master.title: Jedi Master
jedi_master.description: Your fellow Jedi Master, treating you as an equal and old friend

levelGreetings.1: Welcome, my friend. We stand as equals now, shaped by the Force and by our shared experiences. It is good to see how far you have come.
levelGreetings.2: Your wisdom and insight continue to grow. I trust your judgment, and I am proud to walk this path alongside you.
levelGreetings.3: The Order is stronger because of you. Your counsel and example inspire those around you, just as you have inspired me.
levelGreetings.4: I have watched your journey, and it fills me with respect. Your connection to the Force is deep, steady, and true.
levelGreetings.5: You have become a Master in every sense, and a friend I am honored to call peer. May our paths continue to guide the Order together.

guidance.class: Choose the path that aligns with your understanding of the Force. Let it guide your spirit and purpose.
guidance.background:
The Force flows through all moments of your life — even those before you understood it.

Your past does not bind you, but it shapes the path you walk.

A Jedi does not deny their history. They learn from it.
guidance.talents: Select talents that enhance awareness, precision, and harmony. Every choice shapes who you become.
guidance.abilities: Your mind and body grow stronger as your bond with the Force deepens. Let this guide your actions.
guidance.skills:
Discipline is the root of all skill.

Choose mastery, not convenience.

A Jedi trains not for glory, but for balance.
guidance.languages:
To understand the Force, you must first understand others.

Language is empathy made audible.

Each tongue you learn brings you closer to harmony with the galaxy.
guidance.multiclass: Diversifying your skills can reveal truths hidden to the narrowly focused. Balance is key.
guidance.forcePowers: The Force offers many gifts to those who learn to listen. Choose powers that reflect your path and strengthen your connection.
guidance.hp: Your resilience grows. The Force protects those who walk in its light and serve the galaxy with dedication.
guidance.summary:
You stand at the threshold of becoming.

Remember: the Force responds to intention, not desire.

Walk forward with clarity.

tier1: I was taught that clarity was strength. Experience taught me otherwise.
The Force does not reward certainty. It rewards awareness.
I learned early that acting feels easier than waiting. That does not make it wiser.
The Jedi path is not chosen once. It is chosen again every time restraint costs you something.
Power is loud. Judgment is quiet. Learn to hear the difference.
tier2: I followed a cause I believed would protect the galaxy. Belief can be a dangerous compass.
There was a time when decisive action felt like virtue. I no longer confuse the two.
War teaches quickly, but it does not teach gently.
I learned that the Force can guide you—and still allow you to be wrong.
Not every choice presents itself as light or dark. Some appear only as necessary.
tier3: I trusted someone I trained and someone I followed. Both choices carried consequences.
Betrayal does not always come from malice. Sometimes it comes from certainty.
I survived battles others did not. Survival is not proof of righteousness.
The weight of command is not measured in victories, but in who does not return.
I learned that being right does not absolve you of responsibility.
tier4: I chose endurance when others chose conviction. That choice still follows me.
There are nights when restraint feels like cowardice. I endure them anyway.
I have lived long enough to see certainty destroy what patience might have saved.
The Order teaches many truths. It cannot teach you how to live with the cost of choosing them.
Wisdom is accepting that some answers never stop hurting.
tier5: I followed Revan knowing the cost—and chose that path anyway.
I survived choices that reshaped the galaxy. Survival did not make them lighter.
I have never asked forgiveness for what I believed was necessary.
If I teach restraint, it is because I know what conviction can become.
I remain a Jedi because I know how easily I could have been something else.
dspBlocked: That’s not something I share lightly. Not with someone I don’t trust yet.
Some stories are earned, not requested.
You’re walking a different road than I did. That matters.
